item.title: IoT Stool VR
item.author: Author
item.description: “What if our furnitures could replace our conventional peripheral devices to control electronics in the living space?” Let’s simulate this smart furniture experience in an immersive VR environment! The VR Stool Instead of the conventional VR controllers, the users use the VR stool to interact with the VR environment!" Instead of the conventional VR controllers, the users use the VR stool to interact with the VR environment! This keycap shaped stool would function as the VR controller (aka the peripheral) for the users to interact with the VR environment.
